name: CERBERUS
description:
The Preemptive Assault presents CERBERUS

Cerberus is a game about a Knight of Hell sent to find out why the Gates of Hell have been opened. This investigation brings them to a dungeon in which they must fight their way through waves of enemies, solve puzzles and ultimately free Cerberus from the corrupted Cultists. The game is based around a three state combat system, each state providing a new way to play the game, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

FEATURES

(PLEASE NOTE: as of now the game needs a controller to be played)

-3 Unique Stances for offense, defense and utility

-3 Unique enemy types including a final boss fight

-1 large level featuring an outside section and a large underground dungeon

-A variety of puzzles to solve

-Combat encounters allowing for player choice

-Original music tracks

-Original sound design
